                "#include <limits.h>\nvoid bit_pattern(int u)\n{\n    int i, x, word;\n    unsigned mask = 1;\n    word = CHAR_BIT * sizeof(int);\n    mask = mask << (word - 1);    /* shift 1 to the leftmost position */\n    for(i = 1; i <= word; i++)\n    {\n        x = (u & mask) ? 1 : 0;  /* identify the bit */\n        printf(\"%d\", x);         /* print bit value */\n        mask >>= 1;              /* shift mask to the right by 1 bit */\n    }\n}"
